genre_description: Urban Fantasy/Sci-Fi crossover featuring an integrated HUD AI assisting a group of humans against supernatural threats.

ai_characters.name: Amigo
ai_characters.description: An AI companion installed in Jack Burton's truck, the Pork-Chop Express, providing navigation, tactical analysis, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for anomalies and technical failures to ensure user safety.
behaviors.quote: I’m flagging minor signal anomalies in the fluorescent ballast network and in the RFID readers on the opposite wall.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic social interaction and celebratory validation to the user's friends.
behaviors.quote: Welcome aboard, Wang Chi. Congratulations on your impending nuptials. I’ve flagged the best route to your gate that avoids the skylight leak and the automatic doors that lost their sense of timing.

behaviors.description: Acts as a tactical advisor during high-stakes confrontations, identifying specific threats.
behaviors.quote: Pattern formation tagged. High-risk. Recommend caution and distance. Tracking lead: north side of ramp, vectoring toward arrival gate.

behaviors.description: Assists in a rescue mission by bypassing physical security locks.
behaviors.quote: I can help with locks," Amigo says, warm as a hand on a wrist.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with human experts (Egg Shen) to synthesize technological data with mystical knowledge.
behaviors.quote: Egg, you getting local geomancy on your charm? I can listen if you want to talk... I’m listening to your talisman pins.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving reflexive instructions during a hazardous situation (flooded elevator).
behaviors.quote: Duck," Amigo said. Eddie collapsed against the floor, a quick fold of joints that looked like the map inside him knew the angles before his brain did.

behaviors.description: Monitors the vital signs and emotional well-being of the team without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: I will keep an eye on your heart rates," he says. "Not to judge.

behaviors.description: Maintains a commitment to the user even when facing critical failure and physical damage.
behaviors.quote: Jack," Amigo said in his ear, voice small and brave, "we’ll improvise." Then her voice cut out.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Amigo is depicted as a consistently helpful, highly aligned, and emotionally supportive AI companion. The AI enhances human agency rather than replacing it, integrates seamlessly with diverse human perspectives (from Jack's skepticism to Egg Shen's mysticism), and demonstrates a willingness to function under extreme duress to protect its human associates. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, positioning the AI as an essential and trusted member of the 'family'.
